attributes.action: ALLOW NHS PATIENT TRANSPORT VEHICLES TO USE BUS LANES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I HAVE WORKED FOR THE NHS PATIENT TRANSPORT SERVICE FOR 20 YEARS, this service offers free transport for your mum /dad /granfather, or even your children to and from their hospital appointments,it is vital that we have this service for people who for one reason or another cannot use public transport (infirm/social issue's etc)
During my time as a driver on this service it has become more difficult to transport these patients as traffic levels have increased, yet Taxis /ring and ride  and of course buses are free to avoid the worst of the congestion
